scripts.prepare: set-defaults .vscode && forge install --no-git foundry-rs/forge-std@v1.5.6 openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts@v4.9.2 openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable@v4.8.3 transmissions11/solmate@v6 || echo ''
scripts.start: zellij --layout zellij.kdl a template-foundry || zellij --layout zellij.kdl -s template-foundry
scripts.watch_compile: as-soon -w script -w src -w test pnpm compile
scripts.watch_deploy: as-soon -w script -w src -w test pnpm run deploy
scripts.watch_test: as-soon -w script -w src -w test pnpm test
scripts.watch_out_deploy: pnpm compile; as-soon -w out pnpm run deploy
scripts.watch_out_test: pnpm compile; as-soon -w out pnpm run deploy
scripts.deploy: ldenv -m localhost forge script script/000_DeployProxyAdmin.s.sol --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
scripts.deploy_trezor: ldenv -m localhost forge script script/000_DeployProxyAdmin.s.sol -t --sender @@DEPLOYER --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast ~~ forge-deploy sync ~~ @@
